text: Elimination Chamber (2011) (also known as No Way Out (2011) in Germany) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE). It took place on February 20, 2011 at the Oracle Arena in Oakland, California. It was the second Elimination Chamber event made by WWE. John Cena, who was the winner of the Raw Elimination Chamber match received a WWE Championship match at WrestleMania XXVII against The Miz. Edge, who was the winner of the SmackDown Elimination Chamber match, kept his World Heavyweight Champion. == Matches == === Elimination Chamber entrances and eliminations (SmackDown) === Eliminated Wrestler Entered Eliminated by Method Time Wade Barrett Big Show Pinfall 18:48 Big Show Kane 20:54 Drew McIntyre 21:09 Kane Edge 22:50 Rey Mysterio 31:30 Edge (c) === Elimination Chamber entrances and eliminations (Raw) === Eliminated Wrestler Entered Eliminated by Method Time R-Truth 5 King Sheamus Pinfall 17:31 Randy Orton 3 CM Punk 21:33 King Sheamus 2 John Morrison 25:16 John Morrison 1 CM Punk 32:50 CM Punk 6 John Cena 33:12 John Cena 4 ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Elimination Chamber website Category:2011 in professional wrestling Category:Elimination Chamber Category:Sports in Oakland, California es:WWE Elimination Chamber#2011
title: Elimination Chamber (2011)
